mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DAILY (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_TITLE, DAILY_BODY, DAILY_WRITE, DAILY_VIEW, DAILY_PATH, DAILY_CREATE, DAILY_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{write}, 0, #{path}, now(), now());
INSERT INTO TB_DAILY_COMMENT (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_ID, DAILY_COMMENT_BODY, DAILY_COMMENT_CREATE, DAILY_COMMENT_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{dailyId}, #{content}, now(), now());

INSERT INTO TB_DAILY_IMAGE (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_ID, DAILY_IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, DAILY_FILE_FULL_NAME, DAILY_FILE_SAVE_NAME, DAILY_FILE_PATH, DAILY_FILE_SIZE, DAILY_FILE_EXT, DAILY_FILE_CREATE, DAILY_FILE_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{dailyId}, #{originalName}, #{originalFullName}, #{saveName}, #{path}, #{size}, #{ext}, now(), now());
